Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Analyzed the structure of Log A and Log B to identify key attributes, timestamp differences, and naming conventions.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Used order_id and timestamp proximity (less than 2 seconds) to match events that represented the same occurrence in both logs.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Confirmed matches by verifying consistency in order_id and event semantics, ensuring merged events were logical.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Considered whether to prioritize Log A’s timestamps, Log B’s timestamps, or the earlier of the two for merged events.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Decided to use the earlier timestamp between Log A and Log B for ordering while including both timestamps in merged records.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Identified unmatched events in both logs (Quality Check in Log B and Item Delivered in Log A) and included them as separate records.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Reordered the final merged log chronologically based on timestamps and ensured all attributes from both logs were included in merged events.
